posts.post_content:
I have researched all my material and can not find this person.  I date the era to 1941-45 due to Cubs logo.  I can not find a Rich Smith anyplace either as a player or a coach.  I think this might be a Jim Rowe postcard.
Any help would be appreciated.

Hi Jim. You accidentally posted in the wrong section (buy/sell/trade). Try reposting in the memorabilia section. You’ll get some help there. 

Rob M

Coach for the Cubs in 1945-48.  He is included in the 1943-44 Grand Studios Milwaukee Brewers sets.  Played one ML game in 1927.  You can find his vitals at retrosheet.com

Tim

[quote name="ramram" post=1886106]Hi Jim. You accidentally posted in the wrong section (buy/sell/trade). Try reposting in the memorabilia section. You’ll get some help there. 

Rob M[/QUOTE]

Rob, thank you.  I did post in the wrong section and re-posted.  Appreciate it.  I did not know how to delete it.
Jim

Tim,
 Thank you.  I saw Red Smith but did not associate it with this picture,
 Thanks again.

Jim

Tim[/QUOTE]

Please email a moderator (such as me) and we can delete an errant post. Members can edit but not delete their posts. 
Nice work on this id.

Leon, Thank you.  I will do that in the future. I knew someone could help me and they did and I appreciate it.

Jim
